name: Self-Compassion Pack
description: Gentle reminders about self-worth and acceptance. Perfect for difficult days.

name: Executive Function Support
description: Encouraging messages for when tasks feel overwhelming or executive function is low.
messages: Starting is often the hardest part - you've got this ğŸš€
Breaking tasks into tiny steps is wisdom, not weakness ğŸ§©
Your brain just works differently - adapt, don't force ğŸŒŠ
Done is better than perfect, always ğŸŒŸ
It's okay to use timers, lists, and all the tools you need ğŸ“
Executive dysfunction is real - be gentle with yourself ğŸ’™
You're not lazy - your brain needs different strategies ğŸ§

It's okay to do things in a different order ğŸ”„
Your 'weird' methods work because they work for you âœ¨

You can ask for help without being a burden ğŸ¤

name: Masking Recovery
